name: Apartment 2317
description:
A prototype created for the Greenlight Jam.

Apartment 2317 is a first-person atmospheric horror game where the player will delve into mind of the tenant who lives there. You awaken suddenly in the living room, free to explore, investigate items, and solve puzzles in hopes of uncovering the foggy secrets of the past. Will you break the cycle, or succumb to its insidious effects?
